title: Art in the Vineyards
seo_title: Art in the Vineyards | Wine Country Inn
seo_description: Enjoy the perfect artists retreat when you plan your stay at the Wine Country Inn & Cottages.
short_description: Enjoy the perfect artists retreat when you plan your stay at the Wine Country Inn & Cottages.
long_description:
Enjoy the perfect artists retreat when you plan your stay at the Wine Country Inn & Cottages. Perched on a knoll surrounded by the vineyards of the Napa Valley, the Wine Country Inn & Cottages offers visitors a serene country setting to help inspire artistic revelations! To help get you into the creative mood, enjoy a bottle of Schramsberg sparkling wine and a cheese plate for 2 as well as 2 complimentary easels, 2 canvas’ and an assortment of paints.

The Art in the Vineyards package is priced at $200.00 for TWO adults, including tax and gratuity (room rate not included). Available any day of the week. Reserve any night, select the desired room type and add on the Art in the Vineyards package option.
